## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                   | Type               | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------- | ------------------ | ----------- |
| `command`  | `command`  | Command value                 | `number \| string` | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether item is disabled      | `boolean`          | `false`     |
| `divided`  | `divided`  | Whether to show divider above | `boolean`          | `false`     |
| `icon`     | `icon`     | Icon name or slot             | `string`           | `undefined` |
